page.title: 09GOVERNMENT LOCAL MAYOR
page.content: Last term Mr H Solomon came to{ {Ferndown Middle School}so that we could ask him some questions about being the Mayor. He said he used to be the{Headmaster}of{Gorsemoor Middle {School}but now he has retired and is {Mayor of Ferndown.}He told us that if a lady becomes the Mayor, she is called the Mayor but her husband is not called the Mayoress! Mr Solomon lives in{Stapehill}and was the Headmaster of four other schools before he became the Head of Gorsemoor. Every week he has to go to see the {Town Clerk}to ask about his programme for the week. When he visited us, he wore his chain of office. We made a cine film of Mr Solomon answering our questions and when the film was developed, he came to school again to watch it with us.
